description:
Today the whole gang is going to the shopping center. Chi-chan and Uc-chan are thrilled to be seeing one for the first time! Chi-chan and Uc-chan part ways with Yuka inside, and just as the two of them are having a blast together...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dokidoki! Odekake wa Kiken ga Ippai Dechi!
Thrilling! The Many Dangers of Going Out!
ドキドキ! おでかけは危険がいっぱいでち!
